plot: Allison's birthday gift for Joe starts sending her messages, and a highway sniper terrorizes Phoenix.

Allison buys husband Joe a video camera for his birthday and despite the fact there is no battery and no tape in the machine, she soon starts to see images on the view screen of a woman named Kathy and a man named Travis. The two are obviously having an affair and as the images continue to tell a story, it is obvious they are planning a crime. Meanwhile, the police are investigating the shooting of woman who was just sitting in her car. The shooting was the work of a sniper and the entire city is now in panic. Allison comes to believe that the video images she is seeing and the sniper shooting are somehow connected.—garykmcd
